response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $15,000, making it a compelling opportunity for you. I trust this offer will allow us to collaborate and achieve mutual success.", "product_price": 14500}
